column1: mentioned in sections 33, 35 and 48(a) of the Excise Ordinance

I
 observe that this Court had taken into consideration the afore-stated Excise Notification No.
509 in its judgment in Udagama’s Judgment to establish that the Minister had appointed all
officers of the police force to perform the acts and duties mentioned in section 35 of the Excise
Ordinance  throughout  the  island.  It  was  on  that  basis  that  this  Court  in  that  judgment
(Udagama’s Judgment) held that a member of the police force had been empowered by Excise
Notification No. 509 to detect an apprehend a person who has committed an offence under
